metadata.dc:title: HCIP: High-Context Interaction Pattern
metadata.dc:creator: Christopher Coyle
metadata.dc:description: HCIP (High-Context Interaction Pattern) is a diagnostic framework for identifying a distinct mode of human–AI cognitive collaboration characterized by five core markers and multiple variation axes.
metadata.dc:subject: human-computer interaction; human–AI collaboration; cognitive architecture; emergent cognition; diagnostic framework
